body:
So I bought Gold rank and I hovered my cursor over the Nexus kits and they say Assassin and Freezer now I can use Freezer kit but Assassin is not a kit, does it mean Spy kit, as Emerald users can't use that either. 

Ideas...

.

title: [Question] Premium Nexus kits

replies.body:
Don't trust the shop page anymore. 

Freezer: gold+
Pyro: emerald+
Spy: diamond+
